definitions.definition: A substance , such as glycol , used to lower the freezing point of water .
Automotive antifreeze, a solution of ethylene glycol , used as an additive to water or replacement for water, in the radiators of motorcars .
Deicer, a heated glycol solution used to remove ice from the aerodynamic surfaces of airplanes, and prevent icing while on the tarmac.

main_definition: A substance , such as glycol , used to lower the freezing point of water .
secondary_definitions: ( automobiles ) Automotive antifreeze, a solution of ethylene glycol , used as an additive to water or replacement for water, in the radiators of motorcars .
( aviation ) Deicer, a heated glycol solution used to remove ice from the aerodynamic surfaces of airplanes, and prevent icing while on the tarmac.
